actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.

official_title: A Resolution pursuant to Section 303 (c) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974, the provisions of Section 303 (a) of such Act are waived with respect to the consideration of H.R. 13511.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 13511 (Internal Revenue Code amendments).

titles.title: A Resolution pursuant to Section 303 (c) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974, the provisions of Section 303 (a) of such Act are waived with respect to the consideration of H.R. 13511.
